channel.title: 'java' is not recognised as command server error
channel.description:
Ok so i am kinda new at this stuff so i got this error when running the server 'java' is not recognised as an internal command or external command, operable program or batch file
ok so what i do....... yes i do got java and this server is a 562 or something yea 562
and i got windows 7

item.source: 'java' is not recognised as command server error

item.title: 'java' is not recognised as command server error
item.dc:creator: @4markie 4markie
item.description:
@4markie wrote:

[quote=“Pigrear, post:12, topic:337168”][quote author=4markie link=topic=433578.msg3184150#msg3184150 date=1271571739]

Delete it, and never come back here.

First off you’re pretty fucking mean. Go to hell.

creaper, have you set your variables yet? If so edit the batch file by right clicking it and clicking edit. Then you need to make sure the path is correct to the location of your jdk folder. Since the original is probably an old version as you have a newer version.
[/quote]

Wow kid, chill.
You think if he doesnt understand anything theyve said so far hes gonna understand this? Idts. You’re just as “mean” as me , if not meaner. I told him to leave, and you tell me to go to hell, implying you want me to kill myself. Try not to be contradictory.[/quote]

I used to be a total noob at this and had no idea what I was doing. You were too so you just want him to give up just like that? He’ll leave if he wants to. Give him a chance…

Read full topic

item.source: 'java' is not recognised as command server error

item.title: 'java' is not recognised as command server error
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

@echo off title ~UniversalScape~ Compiler if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit

Read full topic
item.source: 'java' is not recognised as command server error

item.title: 'java' is not recognised as command server error
item.dc:creator: @Jonnydpickle Jonnydpickle
item.description:
@Jonnydpickle wrote:

Environment Variables can be set by going to

start --> my computer --> properties —> Advanced system settings —> Environment Variables

If you need more help go to the top “search”
Environment variables

Read full topic

item.title: 'java' is not recognised as command server error
item.dc:creator: @creaper1030 creaper1030
item.description:
@creaper1030 wrote:

???

i got this @echo off
title rs2hd compiler
echo Preparing…
mkdir bin
cd src
copy log4j.xml …
cd …
move log4j.xml bin/
echo Compiling core…
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\javac” -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/Main.java
echo completed…
echo running server…
title Server.
java -Xmx1024m -classpath bin;deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar com.rs2hd.Main
pause
